title: "Optical Adversarial Attack Can Change the Meaning of Road Signs"
excerpt: "Researchers in the US have developed an adversarial attack against the ability of machine learning systems to correctly interpret what they see – including mission-critical items such as road signs – by shining patterned light onto real world objects."
